levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, each attack grants <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP, and <$ba.steal>Steals</> <@ba.vup>{def_steal}</> DEF from the target (max <@ba.vup>{def_steal_max}</>, lasts until skill ends or Surfer is retreated)
